frontmatter.pageTitle: Project - 「蘋果廣告製作公司」廣告生成器
frontmatter.pageDescription: Showcase my side project "「蘋果廣告製作公司」廣告生成器 ("Lucky Advertising Company" TV Commercials Generator)". This website combines a GIF file of fireworks with text input by user, which look similar to the famous "蘋果廣告製作公司" TV commericals in Hong Kong.
